featured.text: Although Maggie has been physically _____ to her wheelchair since the car accident, she does not limit herself to indoor activities.
Just tie it to Maggie’s leg and she’ll know where to take it.
Typhoon Maggie brought to I-lan County a huge amount of rainfall, much greater than the _____ rainfall of the season in the area.

definition.zh_def: 瑪吉，一個常見的女性名字。
definition.example: Maggie loves to read books in her free time.
